item: Hotkeys:
Press 'H' to access the help. (This screen)
Press 'P' to access game settings.
Press 'I' to access the player inventory.
Player Movement:
Press 'A' or the left arrow to move left.
Press 'D' or the right arrow to move right.
Press 'W' or the up arrow to move up.
Press 'S' or the down arrow to move down.
Use combinations to move in diagonal directions.
Mouse Movement:
Click in the direction away form the player to move in that direction.
With the mouse, click above the player to move up (1).
Click below to move down (5).
Click left to move left (7).
Click right to move right (3)
Click diagonal to move diagonal direction (2, 4, 6, or 8).
To interact with a park element, just move close to it.
Click below to move down (5).
Click left to move left (7).
Click right to move right (3)
Click diagonal to move diagonal direction (2, 4, 6, or 8).
To interact with a story:
Press 'S' or the down arrow to select the next response.
Press 'W' or the up arrow to select the previous response.
Press  the enter key to submit your response.
A story will exit when there are no more responses. Just press the enter key to return to the previous screen.
Alternately, use the mouse to click on a response to submit it.
